name: Credit Card
description: Provides comprehensive services for credit card application, account management, transactions, and risk control.

overview.summary: Offers highly configurable core credit card product capabilities covering the entire lifecycle of customer, account, credit limit, transaction, installment, and settlement, and supports rapid integration with major card schemes.

modules.name: Credit Card Basic Products
modules.description: Includes core business functions of credit cards, such as customer management, account/card systems, and card scheme integration.

functions.title: Customer Information Management
functions.description: Provides customer information maintenance functions.

functions.title: Account and Card Lifecycle Management
functions.description: Provides a multi-dimensional account-card system for different business scenarios.

functions.title: Interest Calculation and Billing
functions.description: Transaction-based interest mechanism; provides bill maintenance and inquiry functions.

functions.title: Credit Line Services
functions.description: Network-based credit limit management system.

functions.title: Installment Services
functions.description: Provides various installment options and full lifecycle installment management.

functions.title: Pricing Services
functions.description: Comprehensive pricing mechanism; highly configurable balance object-based pricing.

functions.title: Accounting Processing
functions.description: Provides general ledger and internal account posting and reconciliation functions.

functions.title: Clearing and Settlement
functions.description: Supports batch clearing and error handling.

functions.title: Product Parameter Configuration
functions.description: Highly configurable product parameters.

functions.title: Credit Reporting (Optional)
functions.description: Reports credit card usage and default information as per regulatory requirements.

functions.title: Credit Card Bill Management
functions.description: Self-Explainatory

functions.title: Product Workflow Management
functions.description: Covers processes like account opening, disbursement, repayment, non-financial operations, and operations; supports process orchestration.

functions.title: Customer Agreement Center
functions.description: Manages agreements like online proactive repayment, batch deductions, incoming payments, internal waivers, enabling precise operations to improve repayment rates.

functions.title: Pricing Center
functions.description: Manages product pricing, supports rule packs and rule tables.

functions.title: Incoming Payment Center
functions.description: Supports incoming payments and repayments; enables full or partial customer-level settlements.

functions.title: Style Center
functions.description: Displays different front-end styles based on customer groups, tags, or metrics.

functions.title: Product Contract Management
functions.description: Manages contracts for different products in different scenarios.

functions.title: Deduction Center
functions.description: Manages reconciliation files, error files.

functions.title: Repayment Reminders
functions.description: Bill date reminders, negative credit reporting reminders, etc.

functions.title: Card Scheme Front-End Integration
functions.description: Acts as front-end for card network access; maintains long connections, receives online transactions and clearing files; parses ISO 8583, JSON, XML messages; transaction identification; clearing reconciliation file handling.

functions.title: Card Transaction System
functions.description: Supports various card transactions: balance inquiry, purchase, purchase reversal, refund, pre-authorization, pre-authorization cancellation, pre-authorization completion, pre-authorization completion cancellation, pre-authorization notifications, pre-authorization reversals.

functions.title: Dispute System
functions.description: Real-time inquiry for posted transactions; supports dispute creation, initiation, pre-arbitration, arbitration; tracks dispute lifecycle, status, fees, and timelines.

functions.title: Card Medium Information Management
functions.description: Supports card lifecycle management: card number generation (special rules, vanity numbers), activation, card checks, PIN changes, loss reporting, unfreezing, cancellations.

functions.title: Card Production Management
functions.description: Manages card production and card service providers.

functions.title: Customer Debit Agreement Management
functions.description: Card list inquiry, customer card unbinding, etc.

functions.title: Flexible Batch Deduction Management
functions.description: Flexible batch deduction decisions, smart deductions, end-of-day reconciliation, lightweight reconciliation.

functions.title: Online Transaction Capabilities(Real-time not T+1)
functions.description: Provides online posting capabilities; manages ledger accounts.

functions.title: Real-time Balance Allocation Trial Calculation
functions.description: Simulates repayment day’s real-time balance and repayment allocation using trial targets (card number or product code) + repayment date.

functions.title: Full Payoff Calculation
functions.description: Calculates the amount required to fully settle the account using card number + payoff date.

functions.title: Unposted Transaction Processing
functions.description: Queries unposted transaction information under the customer’s name using card number.

functions.title: Manual Entry of Repayment/Principal/Fee/Interest
functions.description: Manually adjusts cases where the corresponding account (repayment/principal/fee/interest) was over- or under-posted.

functions.title: Manual Adjustment of Minimum Payment
functions.description: Refers to manually adjusting the current minimum payment due under the overdue cycle of the account.

functions.title: Excess Deposit Transfer Out
functions.description: Queries excess deposit information under the customer’s account using card number or ID type + ID number and allows transfer-out processing.

functions.title: Abnormal Transaction Management
functions.description: Mainly queries abnormal transaction information caused by unexpected system defects (e.g., network failures).

functions.title: External Credit Data Integration & Variable Derivation
functions.description: Integrates external data sources for risk automation; supports Python snippets for variable derivation.

functions.title: Automated Approval Strategy Management
functions.description: Supports publishing and running Experian strategy packages.

functions.title: Approval Workflow Management(Limit management)
functions.description: Manages approval flows: blacklist checks, fraud checks, identity verification, credit/price adjustments.

functions.title: Scoring Model Management
functions.description: Validates and operates machine learning models.

functions.title: Remote Review Platform
functions.description: For high-risk or unclear automated approvals, routes to manual review with auto-calling, guided questionnaires, photo/video checks.

functions.title: Mid-loan Decision Management
functions.description: Post-disbursement risk decisions for repeat borrowers, silent customers, etc.; drives credit and risk adjustments.

functions.title: External Credit Data Integration & Variable Derivation
functions.description: Integrates external data sources for risk automation; supports Python snippets for variable derivation.

functions.title: Customer Identity Verification (KYC)
functions.description: Adds facial recognition steps to verify customer identity during online approval.

functions.title: Anti-Fraud Strategy Management
functions.description: Executes Experian strategies; builds inputs, makes anti-fraud decisions based on outputs.

functions.title: Anti-Fraud Model Management
functions.description: Runs machine learning models; builds inputs; makes anti-fraud decisions based on model outputs.

functions.title: Transaction Anti-Fraud
functions.description: Pre-transaction real-time fraud interception; post-transaction near real-time fraud detection; identifies high-risk transactions for manual review.

functions.title: Data Source Access Management
functions.description: Supports unified access and management of multiple data sources, ensuring real-time business data sync and centralized reporting.

functions.title: Data Dashboard & Email Reporting
functions.description: Provides dynamic dashboards; supports scheduled custom report delivery via email.

functions.title: Report Indicator Management
functions.description: Flexibly configures product indicators (e.g., delinquency rate, approval rate) for analysis across departments/scenarios.

functions.title: Visual Report Analysis Configuration
functions.description: Uses drag-and-drop tools to generate interactive visual reports: bar charts, pie charts, icons, text, funnels, data maps, behavior analysis, etc.

functions.title: Unstructured Information Entry
functions.description: Supports single/double recording modes for entering unstructured data, ensuring accuracy.

functions.title: Difficult Case Escalation & Management
functions.description: Escalates unclear work orders to experienced handlers.

functions.title: Entry Work Order Management
functions.description: Manages ongoing and completed work orders, views entered data, tracks operators.

functions.title: Template Management
functions.description: Manages various e-seal templates; queries stamp templates.

functions.title: Document Synthesis
functions.description: Dynamic template synthesis, batch template synthesis, PDF template synthesis, PDF form synthesis (pdfXFA), standard template synthesis (ID card), CDN templates, Excel templates, PDF merges, Word synthesis.

functions.title: Operations Management
functions.description: Manages stamp configs, document templates, scripts, dynamic templates.

functions.title: Document Processing
functions.description: Adds/removes watermarks, edits documents (highlight/fill), encrypts documents, parses metadata, converts PDFs to images, compresses PDFs, uses ML to extract data from PDFs.

functions.title: Anti-counterfeit Verification
functions.description: Supports ESM/ESEAL/ESS signature verification, verification portals, third-party verifications.
